passage_text: Spartacus: War of the Damned is the fourth installment in the Spartacus series, and the official third season after its prequel, Spartacus: Vengeance. It is the final season of the series, concluding the end of the Third Servile War. War of the Damned premiered on January 25, 2013 and concluded on April 12, 2013.

This list includes all of the Spartacus: Blood and Sand main actors and actresses, so if they are an integral part of the show you'll find them below. You can various bits of trivia about these Spartacus: Blood and Sand stars, such as where the actor was born and what their year of birth is.

Share. Digger Harkness-aka DC's Captain Boomerang-is headed to Starling City for Arrow Season 3! According to EW.com, Nick Tarabay, who played the scheming Ashur on Starz' Spartacus, has signed on for a multi-episode arc as a villain who has both comic connections to The Flash and the Suicide Squad.

This cast list of actors from Spartacus: Blood and Sand focuses primarily on the main characters, but there may be a few actors who played smaller roles on Spartacus: Blood and Sand that are on here as well. This list features actors like Lucy Lawless Erin Cummings, and many more.

This cast list of actors from Spartacus: Vengeance focuses primarily on the main characters, but there may be a few actors who played smaller roles on Spartacus: Vengeance that are on here as well. Everything from Lucy Lawless to Manu Bennett is included below.

Tarabay is the fourth Spartacus actor to be cast on Arrow, following Manu Bennett (Slade), Katrina Law (Nyssa al Ghul), and Cynthia Addai-Robinson (Amanda Waller). Matt Fowler is a writer for IGN. Follow him on Twitter at @TheMattFowler and Facebook at Facebook.com/Showrenity.
